Detailed Description

xml_archive is the specialization of class archive able to manage XML persistence.

◆ init()

void eternity::xml_archive::init ( std::string  file_name,
bool  loading 
)

initialize and XML archive using the file named file_name. If loading is true create the file. Anyway init update archive to begin persistence operations. Deprecated: use open instead
